alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Montgomery; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:07PM EDT until September 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Laurens County in central Georgia... Treutlen County in east central Georgia... Northern Wheeler County in central Georgia... Montgomery County in central Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 506 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lowery, or 10 miles southwest of Soperton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Soperton, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Glenwood, Ailey, Higgston, Rentz, Tarrytown, Lothair, Landsburg, Cedar Grove, Orland, Rockledge, Orianna, Barnhill, Minter, Kibbee, Lowery, and Blackville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
